This script will be used to make brain maps to illustrate ROIs obtained from the pilot analysis as per the tutorial outlined by Mowinckel & Vidal-Pineiro (2020).

See Resources:
https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/2515245920928009
https://github.com/ggseg/ggseg

## Setup

```{r, load packages}

library(ggseg)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
```
